data.title: Jeff Vigurs - 2010 - Baseball
data.meta_description: Jeff Vigurs (18) C  - 2010 (Senior): Started all 56 games …Team’s starting catcher for entire season while also earningstarts at first base and DH …
data.text:
2010 (Senior): Started all 56 games …Team’s starting catcher for entire season while also earningstarts at first base and DH … Named Second Team All-NEC andSecond Team All-New England … Participated in New EnglandAll-Star game at Fenway Park … Second on the team with 24multi-hit games including five 3-hit games and three 4-hit games… School’s all-time career doubles leader with 61… Finished career second all-time with 238 career gamesplayed, second with 872 career at-bats, second all-time with 277career hits, seventh all-time with 136 career runs scored andsecond all-time with 1,135 career putouts … Finished careerwith a .993 fielding percentage with just nine errors committed in1,301 plays … Threw out 18 runners in 2010 and finishedcareer throwing out 74 runners … Went 4-for-6 with threeRBIs and a run scored to help team complete sweep of Wagner at home… Had four hits at Quinnipiac and collected seven hits inthe season’s final series with Sacred Heart.

2009 (Junior): Led team in just about every offensivecategory including a .389 batting average, RBIs (70), doubles (23),and OBP (.447) ... Named Second Team All New England and First TeamAll-Division I Independent ... Started all 54 games including 46games behind the plate plus two starts at first and six as a DH ...19 multiple hit games and 10 multiple RBI games ... 17-game hitstreak (second-best on team) ... Went 4-for-5 with seven RBIsagainst Delaware State ... 2-for-5 with three RBI againstNortheastern ... 3-for-4 with two RBI in win over Holy Cross andthree-hit performance against Richmond ... .993 fielding percentagedefensively with 257 putouts and 32 assists - only two errorsall season.

2008 (Sophomore): Appeared in 61-of-64games, starting 61 ... Hit .297 with 40 RBI and 14 doubles in 226at bats ... Posted a .990 fielding percentage and collected 357putouts ... Named NE-10 Third Team All-Conference ... FloridaCollegiate League All-Star.

2007 (Freshman): Appeared in 57-of-59 games,starting 56 ... Hit .276 with two home runs and 25 RBI ... Threwout 49 percent of base stealers ... Allowed only two passed balls... NE-10 Freshman of the Year ... NE-10 Third Team selection ...Played for the NECBL Manchester Silkworms over the summer.

Before Bryant: A 2006 graduate of South WindsorHigh School ... Lettered basketball and baseball for the Bobcats... Member of 2005 and 2006 Central Connecticut Conference EastChampionship teams ... Zone 8 All-Star catcher as a junior ...Honor Roll student.
